## CCR5 activation

In my PhD, I study CCR5 activation (a GPCR) by combining structural data with molecular simulations. The interactive viewer highlights how small sequence changes in a ligand can translate into distinct receptor conformations.

## SLNB and survival outcomes

In research on clinical outcomes in melanoma patients, I study the role of sentinel lymph node biopsy (SLNB) using survival analysis applied to large clinical datasets.
